26.5.3. Annual Summit

The Annual Summit section will include the following sections and fields:

  


  * Next Meeting Date (auto-generated date field)
  * Address



  


Buttons: Schedule New (clicking this will open the Create New Annual Meeting page that includes the following fields):

  * Meeting Title (single-line plain text field)
  * Meeting Agenda (single-line plain text field)
  * Select Date (standard date field)
  * Select Time _MM: Do we have a standard time selection field in the system already? Matthias Miller 02/01/2023: No
  * Enter the location (single-line plain text field)
  * Paste Meeting Link (single-line plain text field)
